page.title: 08The Local Garage.
page.content: J. Peter Tanswell Ltd. is a Ltd liability company with a staff of 10.An old est. business in the village of Blakesley for repairs and sales of motor cars and light commercial vehicles.Local agents and stockists for Austin/Rover. All types of work undertaken by staff from minor service to major repairs,plus sale of petrol, oil,parts and accessories. Also stockists of Flymo Grass Cutters.We repair and service all types of garden machinery. Premises in Quinbury End consist of: Main Workshop area 4000 sq.ft. Built 1974 Car park, petrol fore court and sales area 8500 sq.ft. Old workshop 800 sq.ft. Built 1937 used as motor body repair and paint shop. Premises in High St: Showroom area 1500 sq.ft. Converted chapel built 1877.
